content.rendered: Patients may not want or delay long-term Orthodontic treatments due to the appearance of the braces. In current treatment approaches, besides classical orthodontic treatments, you can have a great smile and functional dental and gingival health with clear aligners (aligners) without wearing braces. With clear aligner technology, it is possible to see the end of your treatment before it even starts with a digital measurement to be taken from your teeth in our clinic. With digital scanner technology, all records and necessary data can be collected within 3 minutes without the hassle of measuring with a small intraoral cap. These finishing simulations, which are made in order to meet the expectations of our patients who apply to our clinic with aesthetic complaints, also eliminate surprises.
